attributes.action: Allow the Public to vote on the total Legalisation of Cannabis!
attributes.additional_details:
A poll taken in London by Survation showed that 63% of Londoners are for Cannabis legalisation. 
If 63% of London are for legalisation, How many more people around the UK are for it too? 
The fact the government continually ignores the increase in support for legalisation is alarming at best. 

Within 2 weeks of legalisation, Canada made $43 million. They estimate the market to generate around $3-$8billion yearly and that is just the start! 

The UK would do it better! There is no doubt!
attributes.background:
We demand the UK government allow a public vote on the complete Legalisation of Cannabis! 

The complete legalisation of Cannabis would boost to our economy exponentially, especially facing Brexit, this is undeniable.
